title: Blowing hot and cold
creator_credit: Chancom, Colosimo Film Productions, Rosa Colosimo and Marc Gracie
brief_description: Set on location in a small country town in Victoria this is a story of two unlikely individuals, a world apart socially and culturally, brought together through a set of circumstances. It is a story of friendship, family and loyalty. Cast includes Peter Adams, Joe Dolce, Kate Gorman, Bruce Kane, Elspeth Ballantyne, Denise Drysdale.
